title: Number of Papa John 's restaurants worldwide 2007 to 2018
summary: In general Number of restaurants has rose over the Year.
Number of restaurants is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Number of restaurants, about 4163.0 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Number of restaurants, of value 3469.0 was reported at Year 2009
